recipes.label: Plan The Slaying Of A Beast
recipes.startdescription: Something unnatural opposes us, half within this world, half without. Pedestrian means of murder may not be enough. I could employ the knowledge of Lantern of the armaments of Edge.
recipes.description: Something unnatural opposes us, half within this world, half without. Pedestrian means of murder may not be enough. I could employ the knowledge of Lantern of the armaments of Edge.

recipes.label: Eldritch Tactics
recipes.startdescription: The laws of the House of Sun still apply to this entity. I know their ways and I know their bounds. We will almost certainly succeed.

recipes.label: Arcane Tactics
recipes.startdescription: Themes in folktales reveal underlying truths. I am illuminated by knowledge and armed with daimonography. We will likely succeed.

recipes.label: Hidden Tactics
recipes.startdescription: Old stories and forgotten myths. Snippets hint at practices and tools that are of use here. We may yet succeed.

recipes.label: The Sacred Tools
recipes.startdescription: My dagger could be rusted, my axe could be flint, in my hand they are the teeth of wolf and they unmake, they unmake, they unmake. We will almost certainly succeed.

recipes.label: The Perfected Tools
recipes.startdescription: The operations of murder reveal the many practices that prepare our many tools for our many jobs. We will likely succeed.

recipes.label: The Right Tools
recipes.startdescription: When a normal blade won't do, I carry sterling silver of blackened oak. We may yet succeed.
